Discover Us who we are Our Story begins here QUALITY-DRIVEN | RESULT-ORIENTED | CUSTOMER-CENTRIC Established in 2009, we have served diverse clients from pharmaceuticals and automotive to tourism and government investment boards. Growing from roots in the digital industry, we understand the importance of intuitive and innovative technology in today’s world. And we have helped create a wave of profitable realities for numerous national and international brands. At Amnil Technologies, we believe in building a “from ground-up to the top” relationship with our clients and helping them at every step. And we aspire to serve quality, transparency, and commitment in everything we do. LEARN MORE Our Mission Our Mission At Amnil Tech, we are passionate about our work. We like to keep our process simple and transparent. And our team strives on creating best-in-class quality experiences for users. We aim for customer satisfaction in all stages of our work. From conception to implementation and ongoing maintenance, our ultimate goal is to provide impeccable customer service to all our clients. LEARN MORE Our Values Openness Flexibility Transparency Intuitive Openness We believe that open communication with honesty is crucial to good cooperation. We always welcome new suggestions. We love brainstorming new ideas and our clients are always open to expressing their concerns or solutions with us. Flexibility Cooperative, collegial, and creative - these words define our company culture. We pride ourselves on having different ideologies and sharing our ideas collaboratively and effectively. We believe in growing with the ever-changing market and we welcome suggestions from all our team and also our clients. Transparency Customer transparency and reliability is the building block of our company’s value. We are ready to explain our processes and decisions anytime, ensuring that our clients are informed of our decisions. We value good communication every step of the way. Intuitive We understand the need for designs and technologies that are user-friendly and intuitive. Apart from creating stunning designs, our digital technologies are easy to use, simple, and effective. Meet the team Meet the team Amit Joshi CEO.

What we do Strategize > Execute > Evolve We provide customized tech solutions that fulfill your brand’s unique purpose and elevate your business. Our creative and technical expertise is driven by design and led by strategy, and we are passionately motivated to serve all our customers with the best service. Business Process Digitization and Automation Data Analysis and Visualization Enterprise Application Data-driven Application Mobile Apps Robotic Process Automation Omni Channel Chat BOT Resource Augmentation Technologies We Use Backend / API Front End Mobile App Database Data Analysis and AI Integration CICD and Devops Cloud .Net Core Node Js Php Laravel Python Vue Js Angular React Js Typescript React Native Flutter MySQL MSSQL Postgres MongoDB Classification Regression Deep Learning SMS Viber Messaging Whats App Messaging Jenkins GoCD GitLab Docker Kubernetes AWS GCP Azure.

Join our Team help us on our quest to make good software even better. SEE CURRENT OPENINGS Software Engineer - PHP Department Development Supervisor Sr. Software Engineer, Project Manager Subordinates Associate Software Engineer Job Summary As a PHP Developer you will be responsible for creating and implementing an array of Web- based products using PHP, MySQL, Ajax, and JavaScript. You will develop back-end components, connect the application with other web services, and assist front-end developers by ensuring their work integrates with the application. Key Responsibilities Job Description Software development from the initial specification, through to developing, testing, and launching. Work collaboratively with other developers in a multi-dev environment. Modify existing software of PHP-based code. Test, maintain and troubleshooting. Manage and improve performance of new and future software. Should have the ability and wish to upgrade themself to other high end applications and BPM solutions as per requirements. Job Specification Bachelors in Computer Science, Engineering or any other relevant field. Expertise in both Laravel as well as support level knowledge of codeigniter. Good knowledge of SQL and related databases, with a preference for those with MySQL experience. Excellent knowledge of the basic PHP 7 or web server exploits along with their solutions. Experience building or maintaining a CMS. Knowledge of MVC frameworks. A detailed understanding of database design and administration. Proficiency when it comes to code versioning tools. The ability to integrate a variety of data sources and databases into a single system. Quality Assurance Engineer Department Quality Assurance Supervisor Project Manager Subordinates Associate QA Engineer Job Summary As a quality assurance personnel you will be responsible for ensuring that products and services meet the established standards set by the company. Duties include maintaining strong overall quality control of products made by the company adhering to reliability, performance and customer expectation. Inspection of products is part of the job with the obligation to report and document findings. Key Responsibilities Job Description Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases. Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities. Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools such as Cypress, Selenium, etc. Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track system defects. Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved. Perform software quality assurance, including black and white box testing, user acceptance testing, and maintenance regression testing. Experienced in designing and executing performance tests using JMeter to assess application performance under various conditions.. Evaluate testing - and inspection plans for projects of varying technology, complexity, and size. Develop, document, and maintain manual/automated test scripts, test cases, test data, defect tracking, and reports. Review log files and other run-time documentation for defects and issues. Analyze the results of software tests and provide results for use in development code inspections. Job Specification Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or B.E. in Computer Engineering or related field. Coding experience with Python, Java, and web-based technologies. 2-3 years experience as QA Engineer. Experience with SQL and databases. Good knowledge of web vulnerabilities and security. Strong written and verbal communication skills. We are a team of hard-working, fun-loving, and passionately driven thinkers and leaders focused on providing the best technical support for local and international brands. We believe in a non-hierarchical and collegial culture, fostering a cooperative and creative environment for each member to learn, grow and succeed. And we are excited to have you onboard! Send us your resume to careers@amniltech.com to explore your career at Amnil Technologies.
